DataElement.preferredName: EPIC-26 - Weak Urine Stream or Incomplete Emptying Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated observation in the past 4 weeks how big a problem weak urine stream or incomplete emptying has been, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to questionnaire._The Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Short Form (EPIC-26) How big a problem, if any, has each of the following been for you during the last 4 weeks? Weak urine stream or incomplete emptying._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
